# isCompatibleWithSavedPhotosAlbum

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you can write the asset to the Saved Photos album.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isCompatibleWithSavedPhotosAlbum: AVAsyncProperty<Root, Bool> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

## Loading suitability

- **isPlayable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether an asset contains playable content.
- **isExportable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can export an asset using an export session.
- **isReadable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can extract the asset’s media data using an asset reader.
- **isComposable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the asset in a media composition.
- **isCompatibleWithAirPlayVideo**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is compatible with AirPlay Video.
